description: This attractive restaurant with delightful views seems to be perched on the cliff, whereas in fact it’s situated just a stone’s throw from the town’s main piazza and Murat castle. Although inspired by Calabria’s maritime traditions, the contemporary-style cuisine also includes a few meat dishes.
